remarks: Implicit substitution of a class for a setvar variable.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2016.)
statement:
vtocld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
vtocld.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
vtocld.3 $e |- ( ph -> ps ) $.
vtocldf.4 $e |- F/ x ph $.
vtocldf.5 $e |- ( ph -> F/_ x A ) $.
vtocldf.6 $e |- ( ph -> F/ x ch ) $.
vtocldf $p |- ( ph -> ch ) $.
